title: New order query
content:
Hi,

How is that possible that I just bought a phone from you and somewhere else it costs much less?

https://www.johnlewis.com/google-pixel-3-smartphone-android-5-5-4g-lte-sim-free-64gb/p3793555

It's unbelievable, has buying directly from Google now become a disadvantage? 

Please give me an explanation regarding this, my new phone is still sealed inside its box as just went to collect it and I am really really tempted to send it back

Thank you 
Naomianna Fusco
